content: a knit version is now published here 1 > also available free on the blog 2 this is an advanced lace pattern triangle-shaped bandana with ties perfect for summer constructed from the tip at the bottom it grows with each row with an intricate lacy detail built on every row the size is variable and you can make it cover a larger or smaller area by changing the number of row you work the ties are practical and light it is made of light cotton yarn which makes it ideal for wearing on the beach in place of a hat size and measurements --------------------- when meeting gauge and working all row in the pattern the triangle measures 60 cm across the top and 28 cm in depth due to the slight elasticity of the lace pattern skill level ----------- advanced - you will work with eyelets increases decreases various repeats of lace patterns materials --------- * yarn 50 g or 125-160 meters of size 2 cotton yarn at about 250-340 meters per 100 grams for example 8/4 cotton yarn * hook tunisian crochet hook with cable or straight 5 mm or hook size that gets you gauge 3 5 mm regular crochet hook for binding off and ties * tapestry needle scissors tape measure * optional stitch markers * tools for blocking iron with steam or other steamer blocking mats and pins easy read --------- the easy read version respects the following requirements 24 point arial font 26 and 28 point and bold for headings black text white background left justified 1 inch margins no columns page numbers bottom left no charts required to make the pattern all abbreviations explained in the list 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/baltic-sea-bandana-knit 2 https //yarnandy com/free-tunisian-crochet-lace-bandana-pattern/
